You know the DW geek runs deep when the first thing on your mind when you see something like this is how cool it&#39;ll be when converted.


Attachment:

<a href='http://www.atlasobscura.com/articles/snakes-hunting-in-packs-cuban-boas-caves'>Found: Snakes That Hunt in Packs</a>


Cuban boas coordinate their strikes from cave ceilings.
